short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Revolutionizing the way you experience education. Less stress, more success. Supports De Anza College student registration.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A De Anza College student registration tool that incorporates the following:

## Features:
- TransferCamp Integration: Displays professor grade distributions by department within the course selection interface, aiding in informed decision-making for course enrollment.

- RateMyProfessors Integration: Incorporates professor ratings and course information directly within the course selection interface, facilitating access to critical insights for course and professor selection.

- Clickable Links Transformation: Enhances the interface by converting essential information into clickable links, streamlining navigation and access to detailed course and professor information.

Feel free to email me for help.

## Updates:

### Versions: 
Update 0.0.0.5 (23 Jul 2024)
- More bug fixes (now supports more professors with shortened names: "Paul Du" instead of "Jianbo (Paul) Du", "Mo A. Rezvani" instead of "Mohamad Rezvani")

Update 0.0.0.4 (21 Jul 2024)
- Fixes bug where some professors' RateMyProfessors ratings and De Anza course faculty page were not showing because they use shortened versioned of their government names (e.g. "Dan Halabe" instead of "Daniel J. Halabe")
- Fixes bug where professors with the same first name in the same department weren't showing up (e.g. "David Newton" and "David Laubner" of the physics department)
- TO FIX: A very few professor RMP ratings are not showing up because they have multiple entries on RMP. (Doli N. Bhambani, Vinh Kha T. Nguyen, Alex Giardino, Al Hussein, and Luis Limcolioc). Also, if you don't see a professor, check if they teach at other nearby colleges, such as most of the De Anza Fall 2024 chemistry teachers have RMP profiles from Foothill.

Update 0.0.0.3 (3 Apr 2024)
- Fixes known bug issues
- CTRL+B/CMD+B no longer opens up the menu

Version 0.0.0.2 (23 Feb 2024)
- Aggregates and displays public grade distributions via TransferCamp per department directly within the course selection interface at De Anza College

Version 0.0.0.1 (21 Feb 2024)
- Aggregates and displays professor ratings and course information via RateMyProfessors directly within the course selection interface at De Anza College
- Weaves essential information by transforming interface to clickable links

## About:
A Journey of Innovation Begins

At Eyecademia, our journey is guided by a vision that marries simplicity with profound impact, an endeavor that begins in its current, early alpha phase. This milestone marks the first step in our commitment to revolutionize education at De Anza College.

As pioneers on this path, your experience and feedback are invaluable to us. Together, we will refine and expand Eyecademia's capabilities, embracing a future where technology seamlessly empowers education.

Join us in this early phase of discovery and be a part of shaping the future of learning. With Eyecademia, every update is an opportunity to explore new possibilities, and every piece of feedback is a step towards excellence.

The future is not just to be predicted; it's to be designed. Welcome to Eyecademia, where the journey of innovation begins with you.
